Query.name: ParNom
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance",sexe As "Sexe", typeLicence As "Type de Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau", diplome As "Diplôme" FROM identiter WHERE actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParDiplome
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",telephone As "Téléphone", mail As "Email", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau", diplome As "Diplôme", CA FROM identiter WHERE (diplome = 'Moniteur' OR diplome = 'Initiateur' OR diplome = 'CQP' OR diplome = 'BPJEPS') AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY diplome

Query.name: ParCA
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",telephone As "Téléphone", mail As "Email", diplome As "Diplôme", CA FROM identiter WHERE CA = 'Oui' AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY CA

Query.name: ParSup
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom" FROM identiter WHERE actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParNonActif
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom" FROM identiter WHERE actif ='non' ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParSPG
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance", sexe As "Sexe", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau" FROM identiter WHERE (pagaieCouleur IS NULL OR pagaieCouleur ='X') AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParPGBlanche
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance", sexe As "Sexe", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau" FROM identiter WHERE pagaieCouleur = 'Blanche' AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParPGJaune
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance", sexe As "Sexe", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau" FROM identiter WHERE pagaieCouleur = 'Jaune' AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParPGVert
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance", sexe As "Sexe", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau" FROM identiter WHERE pagaieCouleur = 'Vert' AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParPGBleue
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance", sexe As "Sexe", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau" FROM identiter WHERE pagaieCouleur = 'Bleue' AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParPGRouge
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance", sexe As "Sexe", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau" FROM identiter WHERE pagaieCouleur = 'Rouge' AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY nom

Query.name: ParPGNoir
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",dateDeNaissance As "Date De Naissance", sexe As "Sexe", numLicence As "n° Licence", pagaieCouleur As "Niveau" FROM identiter WHERE pagaieCouleur = 'Noir' AND (actif != 'non' OR actif IS NULL) ORDER BY nom

Query.name: recherche
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID,codeUtilisateur,motPass FROM utilisateur WHERE (codeUtilisateur = :user AND motPass = :mp)

Query.name: ParUtilisateur
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT %ID As "n° ID",nom As "Nom",prenom As "Prénom",Droit As "Droit", codeUtilisateur As "Utilisateur" FROM utilisateur

/* @doc="Buttons within navigator bar." */

}
.tnbrFilter {

}

}
/* @doc="Row count indicator." */
.tnbrFound {

/* combo boxes and dateText */
.comboboxInput {

}
.comboboxDropDown {

}
.comboboxImgButton {

border-right: 1px solid #cbcbcb;
}
.comboboxTextButton {

}
/* override the default green/blue color with ISC blue */
.modalGroup.modalGroupDialog {
background: #333695;
}
.modalGroupTitle {
border-bottom: 1px #333695 solid;
}
.modalGroupTitle td {

}
/* the effect of the following is to not show text in the top edge in modal dialog */
.modalGroupIframe {
background: #333695;
}

/* CSS du menu horizontal, bieler batiste */

.menu{
    position:absolute;
    display:block;
    margin:0;
    padding:0;
    width:500px;
    }

.menu ul{
    position:absolute;
    display:block;
    width:124px;
    /*margin:0;*/
    padding:0;
    }
    
.menu li ul{
    visibility:hidden;
    }

.menu li li ul{
    position:absolute;
    margin-left:124px;
    margin-top:-23px;
    }
    
.menu li{
    list-style:none;
    width:124px;
    height:auto;
    display:inline;
    display/**/:block;
    float:none;
    float/**/:left;
    margin:0;
    padding:0;
    }
    
.menu li li{
    display:block;
    float:none;
    }
    
/* correct a little IE bug */
* html .menu li li{
    display:inline;
    }

.menu a{
    text-align:center;
    background-color: #9cf;
    border:1px #666 solid;
    color:#000;
    display:block;
    width:120px;
    text-decoration:none;
    padding:2px 0;
    margin:1px;
    }
    
.menu a:hover{
    background-color: #eee;
    border:1px #aaa solid;
    }
    
/* for a mozilla better display with key nav */
.menu a:focus{
    background-color: #aaf;
}

a.linkOver{
    background-color: #eee;

<style type="text/css">
/* YSD3631 Everything below the header remains the same with these exceptions:
Links change to InterSystems blue: #333695
Beige background of right column panels change to light gray: #F0F0F0
*/
body {
font-family: "Source Sans Pro",Futura,Arial,sans-serif;
}
legend {
background: rgb(53,107,141);
background-image: none;
background-repeat: repeat-x;
border-bottom: 1px darkblue solid;
padding-top: 5px;
padding-bottom: 1px;
color: white;
height:30px;
vertical-align: baseline;
}

a {
  outline: none;
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 2px 1px 0;
}
a:link {
  color: #265301;
}

a:visited {
  color: #437A16;
}

a:focus {
  border-bottom: 1px solid;
  background: #BAE498;
}

a:hover {
  border-bottom: 1px solid;
  background: #CDFEAA;
}

a:active {
  background: #265301;
  color: #CDFEAA;
}

<!-- Style: %CSP.UI.Portal.Application -->
<style type="text/css">
/* @doc="Combobox and dataCombo box drop-down style for this application." */
.comboboxDropDown {
padding: 4px;
}
.comboboxItem {

}
.comboboxItemSelected {
font-size: 0.9em;
}
/* LocatorBar Links Style */
DIV.locatorBarLinks {
font-size: 0.8em;
font-weight: bold;
color: #333695;
text-decoration: none;
}
DIV.locatorBarLinks A {
color: #333695;

padding-right: 1px;
padding-left: 1px;
}
DIV.locatorBarLinks A:visited {

}
DIV.locatorBarLinks A:hover {
color: #da4848;
background: #FFFAE7;
}
.fieldSet {

font-weight: normal;

}
.fieldSet:hover {
border: 2px solid #00A09A;
color: #00A09A;
transition: color 0.03 ease;
background: #FFFAE7;
cursor:pointer;
}

.fieldSet2 {
background: #FFFFFFF;
padding: 4px;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: normal;
}
.fieldSet2:hover {
border: 2px solid #00A09A;
color: #00A09A;
transition: color 0.03 ease;
background: #FFFAE7;
cursor:pointer;
}
.fieldSettitre {
background: #D8E1E1;
padding: 4px;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: normal;
}

/* @doc="Default style for labels for disabled components." */
.zenLabelDisabled {
color: #979797;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: normal;
padding-right: 5px;
}
.helpText {
color:#979797;
font-size:12px;
}
.redText {
color:#da4848;
font-size:12px;

}
/* @doc="Item within listBox. Added font-size." */
.listBoxItem {
white-space: nowrap;
width: 100%;
color: black;

}
/* @doc="Selected item within listBox." */
.listBoxItemSelected {
white-space: nowrap;
width: 100%;
color: black;
background: #E0E0E0;

}
/* This is the style similar to intersystems.css's DetailCommand.*/

margin-right: 0px;

color:#ffffff;
}

margin-right: 0px;

/* @doc="Default style for label/caption." */
.caption {

}
.normal {

<!-- Style: %CSP.UI.Portal.Application -->
<style type="text/css">
/* @doc="label style for for Zen control 'button' in this application." */
.button {
margin-left: 2px;
}
/* @doc="error note style used in idRespond" */
.errorNote {
background: #FFFFFF;
border: 1px solid #DA4848; /* red */
border-radius: 4px;
color: #DA4848;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: bold;
padding: 10px;
text-align: left;
display:inline-block;
}
/* @doc="regular note style used in idRespond" */
.note {
background: #FFFFFF;
border: 1px solid #CBCBCB;
border-radius: 4px;
color: #000000;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: bold;
padding: 10px;
text-align: left;
display:inline-block;
}
.successNote {
background: #FFFFFF;
border: 1px solid #94BABA; /* green */
border-radius: 4px;
color: #52B012;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: bold;
padding: 10px;
text-align: left;
display:inline-block;
}
/* @doc="generic label style used for Zen control 'label' in this application" */
.zenLabel {
color: #000000;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: 600;
text-align: left;
}
/* @doc="generic hint style used for Zen control 'hint' in this application" */
.zenHint {
color:#717171;
font-size:12px;
}
/* @doc="style for for links in forms in this application." */
.smpLink a.link {
text-decoration:underline;
font-weight:normal;
}
</style>
<!-- Style: %ZEN.Portal.standardPage -->
<style type="text/css">
body {
background: #ffffff;
font-family: "Source Sans Pro",Futura,Arial,sans-serif;
}
/* tool ribbon */
.toolRibbon {
height: 48px;
background: white;
float: left;
vertical-align: middle;
}
.toolRibbonEnd {
border: 1px solid #f0f0f0;
width: 100%;
}
/* dark green and bold for ribbon title */
.ribbonTitle {
color:#00AFA9;
font-family: Montserrat,Futura,Arial,sans-serif;
font-size:36px;
font-weight: bold;
text-align:left;
}
.ribbonLabel {
vertical-align: middle;
font-weight: bold;
font-size: 10pt;
}
.ribbonSortOption:hover,.ribbonSortOptionSelected:hover {
color: darkred;
}
.ribbonSortOption {
text-decoration: none;
color: #5ba4dc;
font-weight: normal;
}
.ribbonSortOptionSelected {
text-decoration: none;
color: #404040;
background: #FFEEAA;
font-weight: normal;
}
.viewIconBar {
vertical-align: bottom;
}
.viewIcon,.viewIconSelected,.viewIconDis,.viewIconHover {
vertical-align: bottom;
border: 2px solid white;
hight: 34px;
width: 34px;
}
.viewIconSelected {
border-radius: 2px;
border: 3px solid #000000;
}
.viewIconHover {
background: #BFE4E3;
cursor:pointer;
}
/* Menu Bar */
.csMenuBar {
display:block;
position:absolute;
top:2px;
right:1px;
border:2px solid #333695;
border-radius:4px;
color:#333695;
height:42px;
width:83px;
letter-spacing:0.75px;
text-align:center;
}
.csMenuBar-active {
background:#333695;
}
.csMenuBar-static {
background:white;
}
.csMenuBarText-active {
color:white;
}
.csMenuBarText-static {
color:#333695;
}
.csMenuBarItem {
background:white;
cursor:pointer;
color:#333695;
font-size:12px;
font-weight:bold;
font-family:Montserrat,Futura,Arial,sans-serif;
letter-spacing:0.75px;
}
.csMenuItem {
font-family:Montserrat,Futura,Arial,sans-serif;
}
.csActiveMenuItem {
background: #bfe4e3;
color: #404040;
}
.shadow {
background: none;
}
/* Search Box */
#searchDiv {
position: absolute;
top: 117px;
right: 30px;
}
.search-icon {
width: 22px;
vertical-align: bottom;
cursor: pointer;
}
/* @doc="Override ZEN components' default style" */
/* @doc="Text button in combobox." */
.comboboxItem {
font-size: 12px;
}
.comboboxTextButton {
vertical-align: middle;
font-size: 0.75em;
border: 1px solid #cbcbcb;
height: 100%;
background: #404040;
background-image: none;
}
.comboboxTextButton:hover {
background: #404000;
background-image: none;
}
/* @doc="Table displaying combobox dropdown contents." */
/* comboBox */
/* @doc="Headers within combobox dropdown list." */
.comboboxItemSelected {
width: 100%;
color: #000000;
background: #bfe4e3;
background-image: none;
border: 1px solid #cbcbcb;
cursor: pointer;
}
/* @doc="Style for loading message within combobox dropdown." */
.comboboxLoading {
font-style: italic;
color: #333695;
}
.comboboxTable th {
white-space: nowrap;
padding-right: 3px;
padding-bottom: 2px;
font-weight: bold;
text-align: left;
border-bottom: 1px solid #cbcbcb;
background: #ffffff;
background-image: none;
}
/* listBox */
.listBox {
font-size: 12px;
color: #000000;
background: white;
border: 1px #cbcbcb solid;
}
/* @doc="Item within listBox." */
.listBoxItem {
white-space: nowrap;
width: 100%;
color: #000000;
cursor: pointer;
padding: 1px;
}
/* @doc="Mouse hover over item within combobox dropdown." */
.comboboxItem a:hover {
color: #000000;
background: #f7f7f7;
border: 1px solid #cbcbcb;
}
/* @doc="Selected item within listBox." */
.listBoxItemSelected {
white-space: nowrap;
width: 100%;
color: #000000;
background: #bfe4e3;
font-weight: bold;
cursor: pointer;
padding: 1px;
}
/* @doc="Selected item with focus within listBox." */
.listBoxItemFocus {
white-space: nowrap;
width: 100%;
font-weight: bold;
color: #000000;
background: #bfe4e3;
background-image: none;
border: 1px solid #cbcbcb;
cursor: pointer;
padding: 1px;
}
.listBoxItem:hover, .listBoxItemSelected:hover, .listBoxItemFocus:hover {
color: #000000;
background: #f7f7f7;
}
table.tpTable tr.tpSelected {
background: #bfe4e3;
}
</style>
<!-- CSS3Style: %CSP.Portal.Template -->
<style type="text/css">

<style type="text/css">
#table {
width:80%;
}
.optionLabel {
color: #202020;
font-size: 11px;
}


footer {
  text-align:center;
  padding: 5px;
  background-color: #abbaba;
  color: #000;
}

.cadre{
background: url(cadre-degrade.png) repeat-x left bottom #FFFFFF; /* image de fond */
border: 1px solid #CACCCD; /* bordure */
border-radius: 10px; /* bordure arrondie */
width: 200px; /* largeur */
text-align: left;
}
.cadre span{
border-bottom: 1px solid #CACCCD; /* bordure du bas */
font-size: 15px; /* taille du texte */
margin: 0; /* marges ext */
padding: 5px 0; /* marges int. */      
text-align: center; /* alignement du texte */
display : block; /* permet de prendre toute la place */
}
.cadre a{
display: block; /* affichage block (pleine largeur)
border-bottom: 1px solid #CACCCD; /* bordure du bas */
color: #02A3D9; /* couleur du texte */
padding: 5px; /* marges int. */
text-decoration: none; /* permet de retirer l'heritage de l'effet souligné des liens */
}
.cadre a:hover{
background: #ffffff; /* couleur de fond */
}
.cadre a:last-child{
border: 0; /* pas de bordure pour le dernier lien */
}
.cadre a:hover:last-child{
border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; /* arrondie lors du survol pour éviter débordement lors de l'application du hover */
}

.profil-image {
  max-width: 150px;
  height: auto;
}

.zoom embed{
	text-align: center;
	max-width: 300px;
	max-height: 200px;
	float: center;
}

labell {
  position: relative;
}
labe input {
  font-size: 1em;
  color: #f9f9f9;
  background: transparent;
  padding: 1rem 1rem;
  width: 350px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  border: 2px solid #7a7a7a;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}
labell input:focus {
  border-color: #ff4754;
}
labell .password-icon {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  position: absolute;
  top: 60%;
  right: 20px;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  width: 20px;
  color: #000000;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}
labell .password-icon:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  color: #ff4754;
}

labell .password-icon .feather-eye-off {
  display: none;
}

</style>

<style type="text/css">
/* YSD3631 Everything below the header remains the same with these exceptions:
Links change to InterSystems blue: #333695
Beige background of right column panels change to light gray: #F0F0F0
*/

}

/* overrides of tablePane */
table.tpTable {
font-size: 12px;
border: 2px solid #F1F0E7;
padding: 2px;
width:100%;
}
/* @doc="Column header." */
table.tpTable th {
color: #3b84bc;
border: none;
background: white;
font-weight: bold;
text-align: left;
padding: 2px;
overflow: hidden;
}
/* @doc="Selected column header." */
table.tpTable th.tpHdrSelected {
color: #3b84bc;
background: white;
}
table.tpTable td {
border: none;
padding: 2px;
overflow: hidden;
}
table.tpTable tr.tpSelected td {
font-weight: normal;
border: none;
padding-top: 2px;
padding-bottom: 2px;
}
table.tpTable tr.tpSelected {
color: black;
border: none;
background: #F3E799;
background-image: none;
}

.textareaLong {
	font-size:1.1em;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    padding: 10px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    border-radius: 5px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #999;
    background: #F0F1E8;
    font-weight:600;
}

/* @doc="Style for rows when not using zebra styling." */
.tpRow {
color: black;
background: white;
}
/* @doc="Style for odd-rows when using zebra styling." */
.tpOdd {
color: black;
background: #F0F0F0;
}
/* @doc="Style for even-rows when using zebra styling." */
.tpEven {
color: black;
background: white;
}
/* @doc="Cell containing a link." */
.tpAction {
font-size: 0.9em;
}
.tpAction a {
white-space: nowrap;
color: #3b84bc;
}
.tpAction a:hover {
color: #98923a;
}
.tpAction a:link {
color: #3b84bc;
}
.tpAction a:active {
color: #3b84bc;
}
/* @doc="Table around navigator bar." */
.tnbrTable {
background: #F3F7FA;
border: 1px solid #0B4674;
border-radius:3px;
padding: 1px;
text-transform: uppercase;
}

.tnbrTableTitre {
background: #F3F7FA;
border: 1px solid #0B4674;
border-radius:3px;
padding: 10px;
text-transform: uppercase;
height:25px;
text-valign:middle;
}

.tnbrTablePetit {
background: #DBE0E6;
border: 1px solid #F1F0E7;
border-radius:3px;
padding: 1px;
width:40px;
text-align:right;
}
.tnbrTableDate {
background: #F3F7FA;
border: 1px solid #0B4674;
border-radius:3px;
padding: 1px;
text-align: center;
cursor:pointer;
}

/* combo boxes and dateText */
.comboboxInput {
border-top: 1px solid #cbcbcb;

border-left: 1px solid #cbcbcb;
border-right: none;
}
.comboboxDropDown {

}
.comboboxImgButton {

border-left: none;

}
.comboboxTextButton {

}
/* override the default green/blue color with ISC blue */
.modalGroup.modalGroupDialog {
background: #333695;
}
.modalGroupTitle {
border-bottom: 1px #333695 solid;
}
.modalGroupTitle td {
color: #333695;
}
/* the effect of the following is to not show text in the top edge in modal dialog */
.modalGroupIframe {
background: #333695;
}
